issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The correct wording of 'intialize' should be 'initialize'.

comments.body:
Hi [~zhenyi], we should not edit the jdiff xml files or changes.md.

Changes should only be made to source files.
Thanks [~arpitagarwal] for giving me suggestion.I have removed  jdiff xml files or changes.md in HADOOP-15254.002.patch.

Thanks [~zhenyi]. +1, I've committed this.

The checkstyle issue was pre-existing, and the unit test failures look unrelated.
